title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.78 - Schedule of storage charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.78 - Schedule of storage charges

State Regulations

The following storage charges shall be paid for each
parcel checked: (a) Parcels checked by
patron in person. (1)

For parcels valued at
$25 or less or for which no value is declared: (i) For the first 24 hours or fraction
thereof (payable in advance), 20 cents
(ii)

For each additional 24 hours or fraction
thereof, 20 cents
(2)

For parcels valued at $26 to $225: for each $100 or fraction thereof of
declared value in excess of $25 (payable in advance), 10 cents
(b) Parcels checked by baggage
transfer companies. (1)

For the first 24
hours or fraction thereof--no charge
(2)

For each additional 24 hours or fraction
thereof, 10 cents

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.78

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
